title.value: Studying the Characteristics of AIOps Projects on GitHub
title.justification: The study focuses on analyzing AIOps projects available on GitHub.
title.quote: Studying the Characteristics of AIOps Projects on GitHub

extractions.description: This study conducts an in-depth analysis of open-source AIOps projects on GitHub to understand their characteristics. It involves identifying a set of AIOps projects, analyzing repository metrics, examining input data, analysis techniques, and goals of the projects, and assessing their quality metrics. Comparisons with traditional machine learning and general-purpose projects are also made to derive insights into the current state and challenges of AIOps practices.

type.justification: The study involves the collection and analysis of data from GitHub repositories to derive insights and findings.
type.quote: we conduct an in-depth analysis of open-source AIOps projects to understand the characteristics of AIOps in practice

name.justification: The paper focuses on AIOps, which combines AI approaches to handle data in software operations and maintenance, directly related to DevOps.
name.quote: Artificial Intelligence for IT Operations (AIOps) leverages AI approaches to handle the massive amount of data generated during the operations of software systems.

name.justification: The projects analyzed often incorporate machine learning techniques.
name.quote: classical machine learning techniques are the most adopted analysis techniques

name.justification: The paper addresses the implementation and maintenance of software systems through AIOps solutions.
name.quote: we also sample two sets of baseline projects from GitHub: a random sample of machine learning projects and a random sample of general-purposed projects

name.justification: The paper mentions the usage of system log datasets for log analysis.
name.quote: Repository (60705895) collects various system log datasets that can be used for log analysis.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The system log datasets are directly discussed in the main context of the paper.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Repository (60705895) collects various system log datasets that can be used for log analysis.

name.justification: The nbconvert library is used to convert Jupyter notebook files to Python scripts for analysis.
name.quote: To overcome this limitation, we first convert the .ipynb files in each project to the .py format using the nbconvert library.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The library is directly discussed in the main context of the paper.
referenced_paper_title.quote: To overcome this limitation, we first convert the .ipynb files in each project to the .py format using the nbconvert library.

name.justification: SonarQube is used for the static analysis of the code quality of the projects.
name.quote: SonarQube, a static code analysis tool that supports a large number of programming languages.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The library is directly discussed in the main context of the paper.
